title: TALES FROM THE LOOP Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: Show was so damn sad... I hate Danny for what he did to Jakob
I got closure on Jakob but man I still can’t get over it. Seems everything worked out for Danny still.....

It's pretty clear that many of the experiments were abandoned because of the consequences they all seem to pose. The device that stopped time was found in the lake, the orb that switched bodies was out in the woods sort of just sitting there before it was dismantled. The other chamber the told you how many years of life you had left, rusted and decaying, the first robot on the island, the alternate universe. So it was pretty clear whatever power they had discovered it was too much for any of them to handle.
description:
In this video with take a deep dive into Amazon Prime's latest sci-fi television show TALES FROM THE LOOP and explain its ending and many unanswered questions. Starring Jonathan Pryce based off the book by Simon Stalenhag.
